#Dark matter halo mass functions from the MultiDark-Planck2 (MDPL2) simulations
#Ref.: Klypin et al. (2016), https://arxiv.org/pdf/1411.4001v2.pdf
#Note: The halo mass used here are the peak masses across the
#assembly histories (up to the redshifts where the halo mass function is calculated),
#which is more robust against halo mass loss due to tidal stripping.
#z: 0.00
#log10(Mpeak [Msun]) log10(HMF [Mpc^-3 dex^-1])
